name: In the Pause Between the Ringing
description: In the Pause between the Ringing is a rumination about completion, about territorial margins and about the haunting of bodies and memories that are translated across borders. It is an adaption of an unpublished story written by Mir Umar Hassan for the editor of the Malwa Chronicle in the July of 1958.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 & 1 GB VRAM+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 900 MB available space Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
